      • setFirstComponent

        public void setFirstComponent(javax.swing.JComponent component)
        Sets component which is located as the "first" split area. The method doesn't validate and repaint the splitter if there is one already.

      • getLastComponent

        public javax.swing.JComponent getLastComponent()

      • setLastComponent

        public void setLastComponent(javax.swing.JComponent component)
        Sets component which is located as the "second" split area. The method doesn't validate and repaint the splitter.
